activities: JangoMail is a web-based service that allows companies to send email newsletters and other communications to their own subscribers, customers, and contacts. Companies may upload their subscriber data to JangoMail to facilitate sending of personalized content.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
orgverification: In house and TRUSTe (see link above)
privacyprograms: TRUSTe’s Privacy Seal Program Program (see https://jangomail.com/privacy-policy/)
recoursemech:
If you have any questions or concerns regarding this statement, you should first contact the Director of Operations at 1-888-465-2646, 8087 Washington Village Drive, Ste 201, Dayton, OH 45458. If you do not receive acknowledgement of your inquiry or your inquiry has not been satisfactorily addressed, you should contact TRUSTe at http://watchdog.truste.com/pvr.php?page=complaint&url= . 

TRUSTe will then serve as a liaison with us to resolve your concerns.
